page.title: 12COUNCIL ESTATES
page.content: 80% OF THE PEOPLE INTERVIEWED LIKED THIS AREA OF COUNCIL ESTATE SEMI-DETACHED HOUSES. 60% COMPLAINED OF THE AIR POLLUTION , FROM CHEMICAL WORKS FROM THE NORTH AND SEWAGE FROM THE WEST. THIS TOTALLY URBAN AREA CONTAINS MANY CHESTNUT AND ORNAMENTAL TREES, AND SUPPORTS FOXES, TOADS AND SQUIRRELS. PEOPLE THAT THE HOUSES ARE TOO SMALL, LACK GARAGES AND ARE TOO CLOSE FOR FAMILIES, YET MANY KEEP PETS. THERE IS SOME VANDALISM, BURGLARY AND DRUNKENESS. 50% OF MEN AND 80% OF WOMEN INTERVIEWED ARE UNEMPLOYED BUT MOST HAVE HOBBIES, ESPECIALLY GARDENING. MOST WATCH SPORT BUT FEW PARTICIPATE. CLUBS ARE WELL ATTENDED AND SOME PEOPLE GO TO ONE OF THE FOUR CHRISTIAN CHURCHES. MOST RESIDENTS BELIEVE IN A "GOD" BUT NOT IN CHRIST OF IN AFTER-LIFE.
